author: senh
title: Lamar Odom's speech improving during therapy, family says
text: BING NEWS: Family: Lamar Odom’s Speech Improving During Therapy LOS ANGELES (AP) — Lamar Odom’s family says his speech is improving as he undergoes therapy in Los Angeles more than a week after the former NBA star was found unconscious in a Nevada brothel.
